quoteText:
We only retain data as needed to provide you with services.&nbsp.
We never log historical location data.
any such data we receive overwrites the older data.&nbsp.
Under normal conditions, we keep server access logs no longer than one month
title: User logs are deleted after 30 days

tosdr.case: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time
tosdr.tldr: "Under normal conditions, we keep server access logs no longer than one month."
